attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Prolific author Terry Pratchett, has achieved immense global success with a sting of endearing characters, and has recently seen two of his books made into Television Programmes. In recognition of his achievements and contribution to fiction he should be made a knight of the realm.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
